transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaste sir.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Anti sir ha.
Customer: To aap mujhe bataye aapko kya issue ho raha hai aapne 9696 pe call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Hanji hanji hanji wo number nahi tha mere pass aapka na number aapka tha maine add nahi kiya tha na galti se isliye.
Executive: Achcha nahi agar aapko aise number nahi milta na to aap number jaise ki India mart ke application aapke phone mein hai to waha par aapke pass ek option aata hai expert assistant to waha pe aapko mera naam mera number meri email id dikh jayegi.
Customer: Bas bas.
Executive: Ki aapka ye account manager hai uska number hai uska name hai uski photo sab dikh jayega aapko.
Customer: Dhanyavad.
Executive: Aise koi dikkat ki baat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan nahi aisa kuch nahi hai sir ye aapko bas aise hi karna hai description yaha pe add karna hai ki aap apne side se kuch bhi add kar sakte hain jo aapko add karna hai description mein but wo 100 letter 100 character se jyada ka hona chahiye tabhi usme wo 20 marks add honge is product pe.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Aur mujhe bataye mujhe kya batana hai aapko.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji madam.
Customer: Haan sir main keh rahi thi bataye aur mujhe kya batana hai aapko.
Customer: Ek minute bas bas ek minute ek minute line pe main wo kar raha hu aap aap line pe ho bas wahi kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan thik hai thik hai haan main line pe hu sir.


Customer: Ulan ki spelling kya hoti hai?
Customer: Thik hai?


Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Haan sir ab aap bataye mujhe kya kya batana hai aapko.
Customer: Main ye bhi rakha hua kya hai main bas ek baar ye add kar raha hu dekho product add kiya maine.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Kon se norms pure kar rahe ho isliye dekhiye maine kaha itni chalaaya hai.
Executive: Ye aapko wo dikha raha hai ki aap ye wala product bhi add kar sakte hain.
Executive: Jo usse relatable products hote hain na wo dikha raha hai aapko ye.
Customer: Tarah ki baat hai main baat kar raha hu aap ye panch saal din pehle ki baat hai bhauji aaj aapko late pata hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai wo karta hu main madam line pe hai naraz ho jayenge samjhe baat.
Customer: Are bhauji India mart wale mera.
Customer: Hello hanji sir.
Executive: Hanji madam.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji to jo aap matlab employee aapne rakha hai usko sab cheeze sikha dijiye wo kar dega.
Customer: Haan mere mere sath hi baithe hain mere sath baithe hain main unko dikha raha hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha okay okay haan matlab ek baar dikha ke kal sare karenge to unko samajh aa jayega.
Customer: Ye dekho mini idhar aao aur in product ke group bhi add karne hai sir dekhiye niche aapne naam product add kar diya niche group bhi hai ek group haan yahi pe yahi pe group select kariye kon se product mein aayega ye liquid.
Executive: Catanic softener.
Executive: Inme se koi hai nahi hai to new niche se koi textile chemical mein aata hai.
Executive: Finishing agent.
Customer: Isi kya uske hisab se honge.
Executive: Haan niche niche se inme se koi select kar dijiye new bana dijiye jis product mein aata hai wahi group daliye.
Executive: Ye raha upar cat catanonic softener.
Customer: Catanic to apna madam.
Customer: Mere ko lag raha hai meri english aisi hai.
Executive: Mere ko to is product ke bare mein pata nahi hai na sir.
Customer: Are main mazak kar raha hu meri baat suno serious ho gaya.
Customer: Achcha koi baat nahi ek minute ruk jao heart na ho main to mazak karne gaya tha main serious rehta hi nahi.
Customer: Isme na mere ko thickness ki picture chahiye jo synthetic thickness hai na usme thickness ki open picture.
Customer: Mangao use.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abey tu yaha baitho baitho ab yaha baitho photo banao thickness ki mal ki photo banao fir dekho mal ki photo banao fir yaha description likhna wo main likhunga kaise likhunga main unko bataunga ek minute thik hai.
Customer: Ye sari cheez madam aapko samjhayenge yaha thickness ke thickness maine dala hua hai ab madam main aapko na aapka number inko de raha hu jo person aaj se dekhenge usko follow karenge to aaj se aap inko guide karte rehna thik hai aapka number de raha hu aapko phone kar.
Executive: Haan thik hai koi baat nahi koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Aap inko aapne samjha diya waise do normal normal cheeze inko batani thi.
Executive: Normal cheeze main inko bata dunga ye mere se puchte rahenge main inko batata rahunga koi dikkat nahi hai aap inko jo bhi guide karna hai batate raho ye daily phone karenge baat karenge panch saat din mein inko curiosity banegi ye samajh jayenge koi lambi baat nahi hai.
Executive: Haan thik hai sir thik hai to abhi batau ya fir kal ya fir jab ye baat.
Customer: Abhi abhi chutti to 5 baje hogi na abhi to 3 bajke 40 minute hue hai ek ghanta baki hai kar lo baat.
Executive: Haan badi meherbani kar lo baat.
Executive: Thik hai to aap inse karaiye main thoda thoda batati hu.
Customer: Thik hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed assistance with product description.

- Customer needed assistance with product group selection.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to add product description.

- Executive guided the customer on product group selection.

- Executive offered to guide the customer's employee.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will guide the customer's employee.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product description, product group, employee training
